returns._lastVestedClaimTs: Timestamp of the last vested claim
returns.amount: Total amount claimable at current moment
returns.amountVestingToClaim: The amount of vesting that will be credited as claimed during the next claim call
returns.claimedVestingAmount: The amount of vesting that is currently considered claimed
returns.extraAmount: Extra amount that can be claimed (it's included to {amount})

extraAmounts.details: if for some reason claimant did not claim all tokens it recorded in this map for make possible to claim it later

lastVestedClaim(address).notice: Claimant => [last claimed timestamp, claimed vesting amount]

toClaim(address).notice: Returns the claimable amount for a given claimant
